nodes.text: The Star Wars Holiday Special Cantina: Who's Who
The Star Wars Holiday Special Cantina: Who's Who is a blog post published through the Star Wars Blog, on December 2, 2013. It was written by Tim Veekhoven and Kevin Beentjes.
It identifies all the patrons in Chalmun's Cantina during the events of The Star Wars Holiday Special and clarifies some misidentifications.

The post was originally titled "The Star Wars Holiday Special Cantina: We May Not Thrive Friend, But We Survive Friend," after a line in the song by Ackmena. The original title can still be seen in the URL.
